languages.text:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer pushes an enemy with a melee attack, that enemy suffers −<u>(3 × STR bonus)</u>% armour and dodge until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −30 penalty or become immobilised until the wearer's next turn.

Whenever the wearer pushes an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −<u>(3 × STR bonus)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

Whenever the wearer pushes an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

languages.text:
每当装备者通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}敌人时，目标敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会降低{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}%，效果持续至装备者的下个回合为止。
此外，目标还需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中承受−30的减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，直到装备者的下个回合开始为止。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}敌人时，目标敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会降低{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}%，效果持续至装备者的下个回合为止。
此外，目标还需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中承受−30的减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，直到装备者的下个回合开始为止。

每当装备者通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}推开敌人时，目标敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会降低{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}%，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。
此外，目标还需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−30的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，直到装备者的下个回合开始为止。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника, совершая атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника сокращаются на {uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% до следующего хода персонажа.
Также этот противник выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −30 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до следующего хода противника.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж отталкивает противника, совершая атаку в ближнем бою, броня и уклонение противника сокращаются на <u>(3 × бонус СИЛ)</u>% до следующего хода персонажа.
Также этот противник выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −30 и в случае провала оказывается обездвижен до следующего хода противника.

Когда персонаж отталкивает противника, совершая атаку в ближнем бою, броня и уклонение противника сокращаются на <u>(3 × бонус СИЛ)</u>% до следующего хода персонажа.
Также этот противник выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −30 и в случае провала оказывается обездвижен до следующего хода противника.

Когда персонаж отталкивает противника, совершая атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника сокращаются на {uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% до следующего хода персонажа.
Также этот противник выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −30 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до следующего хода противника.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばすたび{/g}、その敵は使用者の次のターンまで、{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}％の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が減少する。
さらにその敵は30ペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}耐久力抵抗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ、使用者の次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer pushes an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
That enemy also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を突き飛ばすたび、その敵は使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が減少する。
さらにその敵は30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ、使用者の次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}状態になる。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を突き飛ばすたび、その敵は使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}％の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が減少する。
さらにその敵は30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ、使用者の次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}状態になる。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, este enemigo sufre −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el siguiente turno del portador.
Este enemigo también debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −30 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el siguiente turno del portador.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador empuja a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, este enemigo sufre −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
Este enemigo también debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −30 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el siguiente turno del portador.

Cada vez que el portador empuja a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, este enemigo sufre −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
Este enemigo también debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −30 o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el siguiente turno del portador.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Stößt{/g} der Träger einen Gegner mit einem{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} weg, verliert der Gegner bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers -{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
Außerdem muss der Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstands{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von -30 bestehen, um nicht bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Stößt{/g} der Träger einen Gegner mit einem{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} weg, verliert der Gegner bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers -{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
Außerdem muss der Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstands{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von -30 bestehen, um nicht bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.

Immer wenn der Träger einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} wegstößt, erleidet dieser Feind -{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Trägers.
Dieser Feind muss außerdem eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 bestehen oder er wird bis zum nächsten Zug des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi subit −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au prochain tour de l'utilisateur.
Cet ennemi doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -30, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au prochain tour de l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur repousse un ennemi en menant une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi subit -<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.
Cet ennemi doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -30, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au tour suivant de l'utilisateur.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi subit −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au prochain tour de l'utilisateur.
Cet ennemi doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -30, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au prochain tour de l'utilisateur.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur repousse un ennemi en menant une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi subit -{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.
Cet ennemi doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −30, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au tour suivant de l'utilisateur.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi subit −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au prochain tour de l'utilisateur.
Cet ennemi doit également réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -30, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} jusqu'au prochain tour de l'utilisateur.
